hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus Deku Scrub Grotto Rear.item: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #Skulls#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Medigoron sells the earliest Breath of the Wild demo.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: Are you sure you want to play this? Wanna go get some tacos or something?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ Before Upper Water Switch Pot 2

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #1# major item.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #before the Truth Spinner gap# in the Shadow Temple locked chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that shadows in an #invisible maze# guard #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Bomb Flower Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Left Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #7# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Din's Fire# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Game Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Green Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.
